trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="DrawItem" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see langword="DrawItem" /> .

trans-unit.source: The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: O `DrawItem` é gerado por controles de desenho do proprietário, como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controles.

trans-unit.source: It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: Ele contém todas as informações necessárias para o usuário pintar o item especificado, incluindo o índice do item, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> no qual o desenho deve ser feito.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar desenhados pelo proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> itens.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> propriedade para especificar que os itens desenhados corrigidos em tamanho e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento para executar o desenho de cada item no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: O código de exemplo usa as propriedades e métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> classe passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos para desenhar os itens.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controle chamado `listBox1` foi adicionado a um formulário e que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento é manipulado pelo manipulador de eventos definido no código de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também pressupõe que os itens foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> com o texto de "Apple", "Laranja" e "Black" nessa ordem.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: A superfície <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> na qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to use, usually the parent control's <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> a ser usado, geralmente a propriedade <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Os limites de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> dentro dos quais desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The control's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> information.
trans-unit.target: As informações <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> para o controle especificado com a fonte, estado, superfície de desenho e limites do desenho indicados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: A superfície <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> na qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to use, usually the parent control's <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> a ser usado, geralmente a propriedade <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Os limites de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> dentro dos quais desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The control's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> information.
trans-unit.target: As informações <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> de primeiro plano com o qual desenhar o controle.

trans-unit.source: The background <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> de tela de fundo com o qual desenhar o controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, foreground color, background color, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> para o controle especificado com a fonte, estado, cor de primeiro plano, cor da tela de fundo, superfície de desenho e limites do desenho indicados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the background color of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor da tela de fundo do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The background <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O plano de fundo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.BackColor%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se o estado do item é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.BackColor%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.BackColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se o estado do item não for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.BackColor%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Esse relatório ajuda a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that is named `ListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> nomeada `ListBox1`.

trans-unit.source: Then make sure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo que representa os limites do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar desenhados pelo proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> itens.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> propriedade para especificar que os itens desenhados corrigidos em tamanho e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento para executar o desenho de cada item no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: O código de exemplo usa as propriedades e métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> classe passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos para desenhar os itens.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controle chamado `listBox1` foi adicionado a um formulário e que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento é manipulado pelo manipulador de eventos definido no código de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também pressupõe que os itens foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> com o texto de "Apple", "Laranja" e "Black" nessa ordem.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background within the bounds specified in the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.#ctor" /> constructor and with the appropriate color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a tela de fundo dentro dos limites especificados no construtor <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.#ctor" /> e com a cor apropriada.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>, the background is drawn with the text highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Se o item que está sendo desenhado for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>, o plano de fundo é desenhado com o texto realçado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar desenhados pelo proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> itens.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> propriedade para especificar que os itens desenhados apresentam um tamanho fixo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento para executar o desenho de cada item no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: O código de exemplo usa as propriedades e métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> classe passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos para desenhar os itens.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controle chamado `listBox1` foi adicionado a um formulário e que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento é manipulado pelo manipulador de eventos que é definido no código de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também pressupõe que os itens foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> com o texto de "Apple", "Laranja" e "Black", nessa ordem.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawBackground" /> in a derived class, make sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawBackground" /> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawBackground" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawBackground" /> método da classe base.

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle within the bounds specified in the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.#ctor" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um retângulo de foco dentro dos limites especificados no construtor <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.#ctor" />.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Focus>, the focus rectangle is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se o item que está sendo desenhado tiver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Focus>, o retângulo de foco é desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar desenhados pelo proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> itens.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> propriedade para especificar que os itens desenhados apresentam um tamanho fixo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento para executar o desenho de cada item no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: O código de exemplo usa as propriedades e métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> classe passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos para desenhar os itens.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controle chamado `listBox1` foi adicionado a um formulário e que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento é manipulado pelo manipulador de eventos que é definido no código de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também pressupõe que os itens foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> com o texto de "Apple", "Laranja" e "Black", nessa ordem.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle" /> in a derived class, make sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle" /> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle" /> método da classe base.

trans-unit.source: Gets the font that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a fonte que é atribuída ao item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> que é atribuído ao item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A suggested <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, usually the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Uma sugestão <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, normalmente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> propriedade do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar desenhados pelo proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> itens.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> propriedade para especificar que os itens desenhados apresentam um tamanho fixo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento para executar o desenho de cada item no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: O código de exemplo usa as propriedades e métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> classe passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos para desenhar os itens.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controle chamado `listBox1` foi adicionado a um formulário e que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento é manipulado pelo manipulador de eventos que é definido no código de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também pressupõe que os itens foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> com o texto de "Apple", "Laranja" e "Black", nessa ordem.

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor de primeiro plano do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro plano <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.ForeColor%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se o estado do item é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.ForeColor%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.ForeColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se o estado do item não for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.ForeColor%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Esse relatório ajuda a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that is named `ListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> nomeada `ListBox1`.

trans-unit.source: Then make sure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a superfície de elementos gráficos no qual desenhar o item.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> superfície no qual desenhar o item.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar desenhados pelo proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> itens.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> propriedade para especificar que os itens desenhados apresentam um tamanho fixo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento para executar o desenho de cada item no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: O código de exemplo usa as propriedades e métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> classe passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos para desenhar os itens.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controle chamado `listBox1` foi adicionado a um formulário e que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento é manipulado pelo manipulador de eventos que é definido no código de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também pressupõe que os itens foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> com o texto de "Apple", "Laranja" e "Black", nessa ordem.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de índice do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> value of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O valor numérico que representa o valor <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> value of the item being drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> valor do item que está sendo desenhado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: This property can return -1 if itemswere removed from the list.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode retornar -1 se itemswere removido da lista.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar desenhados pelo proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> itens.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> propriedade para especificar que os itens desenhados apresentam um tamanho fixo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento para executar o desenho de cada item no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: O código de exemplo usa as propriedades e métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> classe passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos para desenhar os itens.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controle chamado `listBox1` foi adicionado a um formulário e que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> evento é manipulado pelo manipulador de eventos que é definido no código de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também pressupõe que os itens foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> com o texto de "Apple", "Laranja" e "Black", nessa ordem.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> that represents the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> que representa o estado do item que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: This property value can be a combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor de propriedade pode ser uma combinação da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> membros de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The members can be combined by using bitwise operators.
trans-unit.target: Os membros podem ser combinados usando operadores bit a bit.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Esse relatório ajuda a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that is named `ListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> nomeada `ListBox1`.

trans-unit.source: Then make sure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.
